item.title: 9 year old cracks MCSE
item.description: A fourth standard girl from rural Tamil Nadu has become the youngest to qualify the Microsoft certified professional examination. I think it’s high time they changed the course material for MCSE. A quick google search will show that the youngest was 10 years old (A Pakistani girl) and many more 10-15 year olds had probably had a go at it too. 9-year-old TN girl cracks Microsoft exam On the other hand, the youngest person to crack the RHCE is 12 years old, which makes you think.
